name: Rapid Life Movement
description:
Go through the dreams of an old man. 

This was made as a self-imposed challenge to make a game in a month. The theme was “Dreams”. I wanted to make a short narrative that made you feel like you were in a dream. This is the first game I have made, and I enjoyed making it.

All art, music*, sound effects were created by me during the challenge. 

  *Except for April Showers, performed by Eddie Elkins Orchestra
